item.title: 富士媒体高管 Hieda 辞职后股价上涨
item.description: 日本陷入困境的广播公司富士媒体控股公司（Fuji Media Holdings Inc.【原文：The share price of Japanese embattled broadcaster Fuji Media Holdings Inc. climbed after its powerful 87-year-old former chairman and executive management adviser, Hisashi Hieda, resigned from the board.】

item.title: 韩国锌业准备召开最近一次风波不断的股东大会
item.description: 周五，韩国锌业公司（Korea Zinc Co.【原文：Korea Zinc Co. investors are bracing for a turbulent gathering on Friday, as the metals giant’s top shareholder and private equity ally MBK Partners Ltd prepare to make a fresh bid to topple the current board and oust Chief Executive Yun B. Choi.】

item.title: 达美泰国在损失 300 亿美元后成为亚洲最差股票
item.description: 就在四个月前，台达电子（泰国）有限公司（Delta Electronics (Thailand) Pcl）的股价还在全球同行中遥遥领先，促使泰国市场当局采取了一系列措施来阻止其涨势。而现在，该股的走势却截然相反。【原文：Just four months ago, Delta Electronics (Thailand) Pcl’s shares were outpacing global peers, prompting a series of moves from Thai market authorities to halt the rally. Now, the stock is in a stark reversal.】

item.title: 英国家庭能源债务达 37 亿英镑，更多家庭面临贫困
item.description: 英国家庭正积累着 "令人担忧 "的巨额能源账单债务，因为他们面临着世界上最高的能源价格，而政府的福利改革将使更多人陷入贫困。【原文：UK households are accumulating a “worryingly” large amount of energy bill debt as they face some of the highest prices in the world, at a time when government welfare reforms are set to push more into poverty.】

item.title: 新加坡边境需求增长推动马来西亚巴士公司上市
item.description: 马来西亚巴士运营商 HI Mobility Bhd 将新加坡边境的交通流量增长作为公司增长的动力，该公司准备在周五开始上市交易，这在该国交通服务提供商中实属罕见。【原文：Malaysian bus operator HI Mobility Bhd. is betting on increased traffic at the Singapore border to drive growth as the company readies to start trading Friday after a rare listing by one of the country’s transport providers.】

item.title: 东京通胀加速，日本央行将继续加息
item.description: 东京的生活成本上涨速度略快于上个月，这使得日本央行继续保持逐步加息的步伐。【原文：The cost of living in Tokyo rose at a slightly faster pace than the previous month, keeping the Bank of Japan on track for gradual interest rate hikes.】

item.title: 在特朗普征收更多关税之前，石油有望实现第三周上涨
item.description: 在市场为下周初特朗普政府将征收更多关税做好准备之际，石油价格迎来了第三次周线上涨。【原文：Oil headed for a third weekly advance as the market braced for more tariffs from the Trump administration due early next week.】

item.title: 亚洲股市可能因贸易战担忧而挣扎：市场综述
item.description: 周五，由于贸易战扩大的担忧盖过了美国经济增长快于预期的阴影，美股下跌，亚洲股市可能难以找到方向。【原文：Stocks in Asia may struggle for direction on Friday, after US shares declined as concerns of a widening trade war overshadowed a US economy growing faster-than-estimated.】

item.title: 被特朗普 "忽悠"，疫苗负责人努力扭转资金削减局面
item.description: 负责为世界上最贫穷国家的儿童接种疫苗的全球组织负责人正前往华盛顿，希望说服特朗普政府改变停止向美国提供所有资金的意外决定；这一举动令该组织措手不及，并威胁到数百万人的生命。【原文：The head of the global organization responsible for vaccinating children in the world’s poorest countries is headed to Washington, hoping to persuade the Trump administration to reverse a surprise decision to halt all US funding — a move that has blindsided the group and threatens millions of lives.】

item.title: DeepSeek 之后，一种古老的人工智能方法获得了新的关注
item.description: DeepSeek 的成功再次激发了人们对一种名为 "专家混合 "的人工智能技术的兴趣。但首先...【原文：DeepSeek’s success has sparked renewed interest in an AI technique called mixture of experts. But first...】

item.title: 美联储主席柯林斯称关税推动通胀 "不可避免
item.description: 波士顿联邦储备银行行长苏珊-柯林斯（Susan Collins）表示，至少在短期内，关税似乎 "不可避免 "地会刺激通胀，并补充说，在更长的时间内保持利率稳定可能是合适的。【原文：Federal Reserve Bank of Boston President Susan Collins said it looks “inevitable” that tariffs will boost inflation, at least in the near term, adding it’s likely appropriate to keep interest rates steady for longer.】

item.title: 骗子骗走印度散户数百万美元的毕生积蓄
item.description:
印度股市史无前例的九年大涨造就了无数百万富翁，但也暴露出狂热的阴暗面。【原文：

India’s unprecedented nine-year stock rally has minted millionaires, but has also exposed a darker side of the frenzy.

】

item.title: 帕帕斯餐饮帝国对边境餐厅提出破产申请
item.description: 据熟知内情的人士透露，Pappas Restaurants 正准备收购 On The Border Mexican Grill & Cantina，帮助这家德州墨西哥连锁店摆脱破产困境。【原文：Pappas Restaurants is preparing to acquire On The Border Mexican Grill & Cantina and help the Tex-Mex chain emerge from bankruptcy, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 租车股飙升，关税被认为将提升车队价值
item.description: 美国租车公司股票周四飙升，因为预计全面的新汽车关税将导致对二手车的更大需求，进而提高这些公司车队的价值。【原文：US rental car company stocks soared on Thursday as sweeping new auto tariffs are expected to lead to greater demand for used cars, in turn raising the value of these companies’ fleet of vehicles.】

item.title: 摩根大通称债务投资者必须为关税风险获得更多报酬
item.description: 摩根大通资产管理公司（JPMorgan Asset Management）认为，企业债券购买者应能更好地应对贸易战升级带来的压力。【原文：Corporate bond buyers should be better compensated for stress caused by escalating trade wars, according to JPMorgan Asset Management.】

item.title: 卡尼表示加拿大将于下周公布对美国关税的回应
item.description: 加拿大总理马克-卡尼（Mark Carney）表示，加拿大将对唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）总统的贸易战及其对汽车行业征收的关税进行反击，但他周四并未概述任何针对美国的新报复措施。【原文：Prime Minister Mark Carney says Canada will fight back against President Donald Trump’s trade war and his tariffs on the auto sector, but he did not outline any new retaliatory measures against the US on Thursday.】

item.title: 阿根廷一月份经济增长超出预期
item.description: 阿根廷 1 月份的经济增长超过预期，巩固了该国在哈维尔-米莱伊总统领导下连续两个季度增长后的反弹势头。【原文：Argentina’s economy grew more than expected in January, solidifying the country’s bounceback after two straight quarters of growth under President Javier Milei’s watch.】

item.title: 关税前抢购潮推动加拿大原油创四年来最强劲表现
item.description: 加拿大重质原油的交易价格是近四年来相对于基准美国原油的最小折扣，此前，为抵御关税而出现的销售热潮消耗了该国的库存。【原文：Canadian heavy crude is trading at the smallest discount to benchmark US oil in almost four years after a rush of sales to beat tariffs drained the country’s inventories.】

item.title: 墨西哥将利率下调至 9%，并指出将再下调 50 个基点
item.description: 墨西哥周四将借贷成本降低了半个百分点，因为通胀继续放缓，而且该国经济面临美国总统唐纳德-特朗普征收更多关税的威胁。【原文：Mexico lowered borrowing costs by a half-point Thursday, as inflation continues to slow and the country’s economy faces the threat of more tariffs from US President Donald Trump.】

item.title: 浑水公司发布做空报告后，AppLovin 股价下跌
item.description: 在浑水公司（Muddy Waters）发布针对 AppLovin 公司的利空报告后，该公司股价周四迅速暴跌 13%。【原文：AppLovin Corp. shares quickly tumbled as much as 13% Thursday after Muddy Waters issued a short report against the company.】

item.title: 心灵感应录影带》的创作者 "刚刚收支平衡"，尽管病毒式传播大获成功
item.description:
心灵感应磁带 吸引了包括乔-罗根在内的许多美国人的注意，但通过有限的播客系列赚钱仍然困难重重

。【原文：

The Telepathy Tapes has captured the attention of many Americans, including Joe Rogan, but making money on limited podcast series remains difficult

】

item.title: 工党承诺修复英国 "残缺不全 "的初创企业辩护程序
item.description: 工党政府承诺将至少 10% 的国防预算投入到无人机和人工智能系统等新技术上，这可能会启动一个面临落后于欧洲同行风险的行业。【原文：A Labour government pledge to devote at least 10% of its defense budget to new technologies, like drones and artificial intelligence systems, could jump start an industry that risks falling behind European peers.】

item.title: 随着特朗普关税政策的升温，墨西哥将失去什么？
item.description: 与美国的全面关税战可能会给已经在与经济放缓作斗争的墨西哥一记重拳。拉美第二大经济体在很大程度上依赖于与北方邻国的商业关系。【原文：A full-blown tariff war with the US could prove a gut punch for Mexico, which is already battling an economic slowdown. Latin America’s second-biggest economy depends heavily on its commercial relationship with its northern neighbor — its top trading partner by a wide margin.】

item.title: 阿根廷要求提前获得国际货币基金组织 200 亿美元协议的大部分资金
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，阿根廷正在寻求一笔预付款，这笔款项占其与国际货币基金组织未来 200 亿美元计划的一大部分，目前谈判的重点是付款的规模和时间。【原文：Argentina is seeking an upfront payment representing a large portion of its future $20 billion program with the International Monetary Fund, as negotiations now focus on the size and timing of disbursements, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 现金阿森纳让埃尔多安度过多年来最严重的危机
item.description: 土耳其在过去一年中重建了枯竭的外汇储备，加强了金融缓冲，事实证明，这在应对市场动荡方面至关重要。【原文：Turkey spent the past year rebuilding its depleted foreign-exchange reserves, fortifying a financial buffer that has proven critical in navigating market turbulence.】

item.title: 德国动荡的经济复苏面临汽车关税风险
item.description: 据彭博经济报道，美国总统唐纳德-特朗普决定对所有进口到美国的汽车征收 25% 的关税，这将危及德国从多年停滞中复苏。【原文：President Donald Trump’s decision to slap 25% tariffs on all auto imports into the US is jeopardizing Germany’s recovery from years of stagnation, according to Bloomberg Economics.】

item.title: CBO 称，如果没有移民，美国人口到 2033 年将会减少
item.description: 美国国会预算办公室（Congressional Budget Office）周四表示，如果没有移民，美国人口将在2033年开始缩减，从而破坏美国的经济增长。【原文：Without immigration, the US population would begin to shrink in 2033, undermining the nation’s economic growth, the Congressional Budget Office said on Thursday — bringing forward its estimate for that threshold by seven years.】

item.title: 淘金热重返新西兰历史悠久的矿业小镇
item.description:
淘金热过去约 150 年后，矿工们又回到了新西兰的里夫顿镇，他们打赌该镇名称由来的含金石英 "礁石 "的深度远远超过了老人们的想象。【原文：

Some 150 years after the gold rush, miners are back in the New Zealand town of Reefton, betting the gold-laden “reefs” of quartz that give the town its name run much deeper than the old timers could go. 

】

item.title: 鲁比奥警告委内瑞拉不要攻击圭亚那和埃克森公司
item.description: 美国国务卿马可-鲁比奥警告委内瑞拉，任何入侵圭亚那或威胁埃克森美孚公司在该国业务的企图都将是 "非常糟糕的举动"。【原文：US Secretary of State Marco Rubio warned Venezuela that any attempt to invade Guyana or threaten Exxon Mobil Corp.’s operations in the country would be a “very bad move.”】
